title: Une Fee Pas Comme les Autres
description: A young fairy entrusts her magic wand to a friend for safe keeping. Alas, a lover she once rebuffed decides to appropriate the precious wand and destroy the country protected by the fairy. Meanwhile a village preparations are afoot to receive, Barbara the famous singer, for an evening of unforgettable musical entertainment. Saturnin and a group of villagers must battle to retrieve the magic wand from evil hands and save their village. This children's film is cast with live animals.  Credits: Producer, Pierre Bochart ; director, Jean Tourane ; writers, Louise de Villemorin, Jean Tourane, R. Lavigne ; photography, Maurice Fellous ; music, Richard Cornu. Cast: Robert Lamoureux [narration].
